record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON CALENDAR--S. 1639

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I understand that S. 1639 is at the desk and is due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.

speaking.paragraph: I would object to further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. Under rule XIV, the bill will be placed on the calendar.
